<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataPM extends data { const CODE = 'PM'; const PREFIX = 508; const REGION = 'North America'; const PATTERNS = array( '[45]\d{5}', ); const TYPES = array( '(?:4[1-3]|50)\d{4}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '(?:4[02-4]|5[05])\d{4}'=>array( 'mobile', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})'=>'$1 $2 $3', ); }
